categories.title: Image Prompt Inspiration
categories.description: Craft richer visuals with tools that help you iterate on prompts, experiment with composition, and build reusable style libraries.

tools.name: Midjourney
tools.description: A community-driven platform for creating stunning generative art with natural language prompts and remix workflows.
tools.prompt: Ultra-detailed cinematic portrait of an explorer standing in bioluminescent mist, 85mm lens, volumetric lighting, hyper-realistic textures, vivid teal and magenta color palette

tools.name: PromptHero
tools.description: Search thousands of AI images and prompts to discover stylistic inspiration for your next visual concept.
tools.prompt: Concept art of a floating library drifting above a desert oasis at dusk, warm golden hour light, intricate arabesque patterns, Studio Ghibli vibes

tools.name: Lexica
tools.description: Explore an expansive gallery of Stable Diffusion prompts paired with high-quality outputs to refine your ideas.
tools.prompt: Wide-angle shot of a futuristic greenhouse nestled inside an icy cavern, soft diffused lighting, lush botanicals, reflective frost surfaces, 32k resolution

categories.title: AI Productivity Tools
categories.description: Automate repetitive work, co-create content, and accelerate research with these powerful, everyday AI companions.

tools.name: Notion AI
tools.description: Brainstorm, summarize, translate, and edit content directly inside the Notion workspace you already use.

tools.name: Perplexity
tools.description: A conversational answer engine that blends search and generative AI to deliver fast, sourced research.

tools.name: Gamma
tools.description: Transform ideas into polished decks, documents, and webpages with natural language commands and smart templates.
